text: Vampires Suck is a 2010 American horror comedy film directed by Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer. It is a parody of the Twilight film series, and stars Jenn Proske, Matt Lanter, Christopher N. Riggi, Ken Jeong, Anneliese van der Pol, and Arielle Kebbel. 20th Century Fox theatrically released the film on August 18, 2010.
